But the most important thing? You have to *stay underground* and *stay true*. The mainstream media will attack you, label you a bigot, a hater, a conspiracy theorist. But that’s just another tactic. They fear the truth. They fear the awakening.

The truth is out there. It’s just buried under a mountain of lies. And only those with the courage to dig will ever see it for what it is.
